opis: NAPOMENA: VIDEO U PRILOGU. Prodaje se prekrasna i izuzetno kvalitetno izgrađena villa (2008 g.) na zemljištu od 1335m2, udaljena 1,1 km od Aleje Bologne.Sastoji se od : PRIZEMLJE-PODRUM- garaža za 2 automobila, vešeraj, kupaona, prostor za fitness ili druženje, kotlovnica VISOKO PRIZEMLJE-kuhinja s blagovaonom, dnevni boravak,velika terasa ,wc, radna soba, gostinjska soba s kupaonom KAT-2 sobe s kupaonom i zajedničkim balkonom ,galerija-boravak, spavaća soba s kupaonom i garderobom, velika terasa Ispred kuće je parking prostor za 4 automobila, prekrasno uređena okućnica. NOTE: VIDEO ATTACHED. A beautiful and extremely well-built villa (2008) is for sale on a plot of land of 1335m2, 1.1 km from Aleja Bologna. It consists of: GROUND FLOOR-BASEMENT- garage for 2 cars, laundry room, bathroom, space for fitness or socializing, boiler room HIGH GROUND FLOOR - kitchen with dining room, living room, large terrace, toilet, study, guest room with bathroom FLOOR-2 rooms with bathroom and common balcony, gallery-living room, bedroom with bathroom and wardrobe, large terrace In front of the house is a parking space for 4 cars, a beautifully landscaped garden.
